QuestData.Title: Wolfsbane Root
QuestData.Description: Have you heard of the wolfsbane plant? It is a horrible weed... it destroys our farmable crops.$B$BWe spent all of last week cutting them down, but the roots are beginning to sprout again.$B$BIt might not seem like an urgent matter, but a resurgence of the plant could be a real... disaster. Do you think you could help us by uprooting them where you find them near the village?
QuestData.LogDescription: Katja in Silverbrook wants you to uproot 8 Wolfsbane Roots.
QuestData.RewardText: <Katja reels away from you nervously.>$B$BThank you, $n. You didn't get any wolfsbane on you, did you? I've got these... allergies that act up once in a while.
